title: Find magnetic force near three parallel wires

content.question: The currents in three parallel wires, X, Y, and Z, each have magnitude I and are in the directions shown above. Wire Y is closer to wire X than to wire Z. The magnetic force on wire Y is

choices.label: toward the bottom of the page

topic.text: 12.3: Magnetic Fields of Current-Carrying Wires and the Biot-Savart Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
